name: PH Carpet House
overview:
Established in the year 2005, we, “P. H. Carpet House” are one of the prominent organizations engaged in the domain of trading and supplying a comprehensive range of PVC Carpet, Wall Paper, Window Blind, Glass Film, False Ceiling and Insulation Material. Under the offered array, we provide PVC Carpet, Acrylic Carpet, Wooden Flooring Carpet, Non Woven Carpet, PVC Tiles Carpet, PVC Spot Carpet, Loop Pile Carpet and Woven Carpet.

Our Team: Product procuring agents Quality controllers Warehouse managers Sales and marketing experts

Our Quality: We are a quality-driven organization, and ensure consistent quality in our range from procurement process till delivery to the client. For the purpose, we have skilled team of quality experts which prevent any breach in quality standards at any level.

Vendor Base: We largely depend upon our vendor base for our product range and with the help of these reliable vendors, we have become one of the trusted names in the industry. In order to ensure high-grade products to our clients, we procure our products from reputed manufacturers. These vendors have been consistently delivering qualitative products to us, which in turn helps us fulfill the exact requirements of our clients.

Client Satisfaction: As a renowned trader and supplier, we understand the importance of achieving clients’ satisfaction to the maximum level. All our professionals are well aware of their requirements and accordingly assist us in meeting the same. The client centric approach is followed right from the initial stage of procuring and is continued till the final delivery of the consignments is finished.
